pinyin: A1 la1 bo2 Dian4 xin4 Lian2 meng2

definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet
oath/pledge/union/to ally/league, a subdivision corresponding to prefecture in Inner Mongolia
